an6.21:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati sāmagāmake pokkharaṇiyāyaṁ.
an6.21:1.2: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ pokkharaṇiyaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.21:2.4: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an6.21:2.7: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.21:3.2: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ pokkharaṇiyaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, bhikkhave, sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
an6.21:3.6: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattantī’ti.
an6.21:3.8: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:3.9: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, alābhā tesaṁ dulladdhaṁ, ye vo devatāpi jānanti kusalehi dhammehi parihāyamāne.
an6.21:4.1: Aparepi, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
an6.21:4.2: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.21:4.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an6.21:4.7: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniyā dhammā.
an6.21:5.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṁ parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyiṁsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṁ parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:5.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
